BoolProperty.Name: UseCcache
BoolProperty.Description: Use ccache for compiling. If this option is disabled, the Microsoft compiler (cl.exe) will be used instead.

StringProperty.Name: CcacheAdditionalOptions
StringProperty.Description: Additional options to pass to clang. This is essentially the same as C/C++ > Command Line > Additional Options, except that it is safe to put options here that will be rejected by cl.exe in case you switch toolchains back and forth.

BoolProperty.Name: UseLldLink
BoolProperty.Description: Use lld-link for linking. If this option is disabled, the Microsoft linker (link.exe) will be used instead.

StringProperty.Name: LldLinkAdditionalOptions
StringProperty.Description: Additional options to pass to lld-link. This is essentially the same as General > Linker > Command Line > Additional Options, except that it is safe to put options here that will be rejected by link.exe in case you switch toolchains back and forth.

BoolProperty.Name: UseccacheLib
BoolProperty.Description: Use ccache-lib for managing libraries. If this option is disabled, the Microsoft librarian (lib.exe) will be used instead.

StringProperty.Name: ccacheLibAdditionalOptions
StringProperty.Description: Additional options to pass to ccache-lib. This is essentially the same as General > Librarian > Command Line > Additional Options, except that it is safe to put options here that will be rejected by lib.exe in case you switch toolchains back and forth.

BoolProperty.Name: UseccacheRc
BoolProperty.Description: Use ccache-rc for compiling resources. If this option is disabled, the Microsoft resource compiler (rc.exe) will be used instead.

StringProperty.Name: ccacheRcAdditionalOptions
StringProperty.Description: Additional options to pass to ccache-rc. This is essentially the same as General > Resources > Command Line > Additional Options, except that it is safe to put options here that will be rejected by rc.exe in case you switch toolchains back and forth.
